wikipedia_page.main: Charles William Harley Hay, 16th Earl of Kinnoull,  (born 20 December 1962), styled Viscount Dupplin until 2013, is a Scottish hereditary peer and non-affiliated member of the House of Lords, serving as Chair of the European Union Committee.
